trans-unit.source: Pick plugin type

The plugin type determines what view is shown on the frontend. List/Show is the default view, showing a configurable list on which the user can click to individual videostreams. Preset single video shows a single configured videostream directly, and nothing else. Livestream does the same, but looks specifically for a livestream that is currently active.
Show videos specific date
Shows videostreams specifically of the chosen date. Note that the use of this field will disable the other date/time fields!
Show videos starting on date/time
Shows videostreams that started on or after the chosen date/time. This field can be combined with the "End" field to set a limited range. Note that this field is disabled if the "Date" field is used!
Show videos up until date/time

Shows videostreams that started and ended up until the chosen date/time. This field can be combined with the "Start" field to set a limited range. Note that this field is disabled if the "Date" field is used!
Category
Show videostreams of the chosen category.
Sub Category
Show videostreams of the chosen subcategory.
Tags
Show videostreams with the chosen tags. In case of multiple tags, separate them with a colon.
Videostream Session Hash
Set the unique session hash of the videostream that is to be played by this plugin. The hash can be found within the Streamovations Video CMS.
Target Page for Show-view
If you want videostream links to point to another page with the List/Show plugin type, you can set the page id here. This can be used to simulate a list/show separation of pages.
Back Page on Show-view
If you want videostream back-links to point to another page with List/Show plugin type, you can set the page id here. This can be used to simulate a list/show separation of pages.
